type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.maven.MavenDeployment
type.description: Represents the artifacts which will be deployed to a Maven repository. You can use this interface to modify the set of artifacts.

method.name: addArtifact
method.description:
Adds an additional artifact to this deployment.
param:artifact The artifact to add.

method.name: getArtifacts
method.description:
Returns the artifacts which will be deployed. Includes the POM artifact.

returns:The artifacts. Never null.

method.name: getAttachedArtifacts
method.description:
Returns the additional artifacts for this deployment.

returns:the additional artifacts for this deployment. Never null.

method.name: getMainArtifact
method.description:
Returns the main artifact for this deployment.

returns:The main artifact. May be null.

method.name: getPomArtifact
method.description:
Returns the POM for this deployment.

returns:The POM. Never null.

property.name: artifacts
property.description:
Returns the artifacts which will be deployed. Includes the POM artifact.

returns:The artifacts. Never null.

property.name: attachedArtifacts
property.description:
Returns the additional artifacts for this deployment.

returns:the additional artifacts for this deployment. Never null.

property.name: mainArtifact
property.description:
Returns the main artifact for this deployment.

returns:The main artifact. May be null.

property.name: pomArtifact
property.description:
Returns the POM for this deployment.

returns:The POM. Never null.
